lead_paragraph: Officials say outsiders have made the city especially volatile as protests continue and arrests mount, but demonstrators say it is the excessive tactics of the police.

byline.original: By CAMPBELL ROBERTSON and FRANCES ROBLES

headline.print_headline: Escalating Discord Between the Police and Protesters Strains Baton Rouge
headline.main: Escalating Discord Between Police and Protesters Strains Baton Rouge

snippet: Officials say outsiders have made the city especially volatile as protests continue and arrests mount, but demonstrators say it is the excessive tactics of the police....
abstract: Tensions remain high in Baton Rouge, La, where near-nightly protests over fatal shooting of Alton Sterling by police pit officers in riot gear against demonstrators; police say presence of non-local protesters has increased anxieties and arrests; ongoing investigation is unlikely to satisfy skeptics of city officials' account of shooting.
